messages.subject: How to overcome fears
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 5/17/2005 2:17:05 PM Mountain Daylight Time, rinnyboo@yahoo.com writes: If I  can t measure his learning with grades will my head
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 5/17/2005 2:17:05 PM Mountain Daylight Time,
rinnyboo@... writes:

If I can't "measure" his learning with
grades will my head explode:)? How do you let go of that kind of
mindset?


------------------------------------------------

How did you learn to ride a bike?

How did you walk from your house to the store the first time you ever did?


You don't do it by thinking about it. You do it by getting up out of your
comfortable chair, walking toward your goal, and learning to do it.

_http://sandradodd.com/deschooling_ (http://sandradodd.com/deschooling)

Don't just read that one. Follow the links and see how others describe it.
And then don't just read it, and don't just think about it.

Reading about bicycles isn't learning to ride, and looking at the sale
flyers isn't going to the grocery store.

Sandra


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
